Art covers galore! A blog dedicated to showcase only the best comic book and non-comic book covers from different companies, both mainstream and indie. All art is credited and (usually) linked to artists' personal blogs. This blog is run by several people, who are more than happy to help you with anything. Requests & asks are always welcomed. Members:

Mister JJJ Comics (@misterjjjcomics)

MaxMarvel123 (@maxmarvel123)

Disclaimer: All credit goes to original owners, companies and creative teams.Thank you for stopping by!

summary:
you have thanos on the receiving end of a Bullying PSA
you have thanos in a choppa choppa they called "thanos copter" cause why...
body:
this entire comic is a fucking masterpiece

you have thanos on the receiving end of a Bullying PSA

you have thanos in a choppa choppa they called “thanos copter” cause why Not

you have thanos being a Fucking Klutz and spiderman saying the dumbest shit

in the end, the bullied kid defeats his bully as this comic is a fucking pop music video apparently (where was this fucking kid in infinity war)

and Thanos gets arrested by the new york city police department i’m-

this comic reads like a high tier shitpost and im Living for it

bro i dont know how to spell it
summary: what if tony had died in the snap
body:
what if tony had died in the snap

  • what if, amidst the orange light and the lingering adrenaline
  • peter parker felt flames lick and twist at the base of his skull, a warning, danger, danger
  • (“something’s happening.”)
  • what if he scoured the horizon for his fight, and found his mentor already engaging in one
  • face pale, mouth drawn into a grin that’s almost a snarl, tony stark is losing
  • “I’m gonna beat you someday,” Peter promises, watching Tony’s Mario Kart victory lap with glinting eyes. He’s slumped down low on the couch. There’s sugar smeared on his cheek, and popcorn littering his lap. “Even better - I’m gonna beat you with Toad.”
  • “I never lose, Underoos,” Tony informs him matter-of-factly, setting his controller down and picking up his coffee, taking a sip. It’s cold, Peter notes amusedly. You could tell by the way his nose scrunches up.
  • Princess Peach smiles sweetly from first place. Yoshi watches dejectedly from a cliff. The older man flicks a piece of popcorn at Peter, eliciting a yelp. “Just doesn’t happen. Sorry.”
  • sorry.
  • their eyes meet, brown to brown, fighter to fighter, father to son
  • and tony crumbles
  • autumn leaves whisper up his legs, eating away at his cells
  • as a child, peter had stood in the park on many a day, chasing the red-gold leaves. waiting for the moment they would swirl around him and lift him up, up, and away. take him somewhere magical. another planet, perhaps.
  • this? is nothing like that.
  • the leaves are here, yes, but they are dead, brown, dull, and they do not take you somewhere magical. they are taking mr. stark. they are stealing him away. away from peter.
  • it’s a sick rendition of a childhood fantasy.
  • the leaves bubble and froth at his calves, abdomen, chest, oh my god oh my god this isn’t happening not again oh my god
  • peter rushes forward and catches him as he falls
  • mr. stark’s heart is beating fast and hard, thudding in his ears like an emergency siren
  • his eyes are wide and face frozen
  • tony didn’t expect this.
  • he was always the one who picked up the pieces. never the one who d
  • the arms that are gripping his back are shaking. they’re shaking like the autumn trees, and the leaves will fall soon.
  • “Mr. Stark - ”
  • “Peter.” those wide eyes are determined now, crinkled at the corners in a forced smile, wet with an emotion he doesn’t want to name. “This. Is. Not. Your. Fault. Understood?”
  • the leaves are swirling. up, up, and up tony’s torso. away.
  • his mouth is dry. please, not again.
  • “Peter. Kid, look at me. I swear to god if you blame yourself I will kick your ass. Understood?” his voice is shaking now, but his expression is steady. it’s so incredibly mr. stark that peter’s throat burns.
  • they’re on the ground now, ash dripping and mixing with the dust that floats as golden specks in the air. like stars. stardust.
  • “Understood, Tony.”
  • a breathy laugh sounds by his ear. “Only when I’m dying, h -?”
  • he doesn’t finish the sentence.
  • up, up, and away.
  • peter parker is left with memories, and dreams, and leaves crushed in between his fingertips.
  • his parents.
  • ben.
  • mr. stark.
  • life is a cycle, and he runs as a hamster on a wheel, a leaf in a gust of wind, a kid on a donut ship
  • the sky is orange. the leaves were brown. the ashes are grey.
  • again, and again, and again.
  • what if.

tags: i wrote i dont call tony stark dead instead of dad omg
my own mistake gave me whiplash
summary:
Ned:...and then we went to the park, Peter what’d you do for Father’s Day? Oh wait sorry
Peter: sorry? For what? We spent the...
body:
Ned:…and then we went to the park, Peter what’d you do for Father’s Day? Oh wait sorry

Peter: sorry? For what? We spent the whole day in the lab it was great and then we ordered pizza from my favorite place!

Ned: what? I thought your dad was dead

Peter:…..OH oh yeah super dead idk where that came from probably a book I read haha I don’t call Tony Stark dad pshhh

reblog.comment:

trail.content_raw:
Ned:…and then we went to the park, Peter what’d you do for Father’s Day? Oh wait sorry

Peter: sorry? For what? We spent the whole day in the lab it was great and then we ordered pizza from my favorite place!

Ned: what? I thought your dad was dead

Peter:…..OH oh yeah super dead idk where that came from probably a book I read haha I don’t call Tony Stark dad pshhh
trail.content:
Ned:…and then we went to the park, Peter what’d you do for Father’s Day? Oh wait sorry

Peter: sorry? For what? We spent the whole day in the lab it was great and then we ordered pizza from my favorite place!

Ned: what? I thought your dad was dead

Peter:…..OH oh yeah super dead idk where that came from probably a book I read haha I don’t call Tony Stark dad pshhh

summary:
Tony, holding a sobbing Peter in his arms: you wanna tell me why you're crying?
Peter: im not ready
Tony: its ok take your...
body:
Tony, holding a sobbing Peter in his arms: you wanna tell me why you’re crying?

Peter: im not ready

Tony: its ok take your time

Peter, sniffling: …i dropped my sandwich and i don’t have money for another one
